computer.description:
The PC-6601 is basicaly a PC-6001 MK2 with a built-in 3.5'' disk drive. The second optional disk drive could also be mounted. The N60m Basic od the PC-6001 MK2 has been enhanced to the N66 Basic.
The japanese adverts focused on the fact that this computer could sing with its optional speech synthesizer!
More info badly needed!
computer.graphics: 80 x 40 (15 colors), 160 x 200 (15 colors), 320 x 200 (4 colors)
computer.keyboard: Full-stroke keyboard, JIS standard layout, 5 function keys
computer.media: One or two 3.5'' floppy disk drive (SS/DD 143 KB)
computer.name: PC 6601
computer.ports: Tape interface (600/1200 baud), RGB video output, composite video output, RF TV output, parallel interface, optional RS-232c interface
computer.rom: 32 KB (Basic + machine language monitor) + 32 KB (chinese characters) + 16 KB (voice data) + 16 KB
